bonus.value: Increase final damage by 3%/3.4%/3.8%/4.2% and final crit rate by 2%/2%/2.4%/2.4% for 25 seconds when hitting a target with a flame weapon, stacking up to 2 times. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.

When equipping 2 or more flame weapons, gain Flowing Fire, which increases final damage by 7%/8%/9%/10%, and increases crit damage by an additional 12%/14%/16%/18% for 25 seconds after landing a critical hit. For every 3 charged attacks that hit the target, restore 1 dodge attempt. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.

memory.name: Comando Vago
memory.desc: Fica sem resposta facilmente se não receber comandos.

belief.name: Altruísta
belief.desc: — Uma das últimas palavras que se usariam para descrever um vampiro.

emotion.name: Folhas Secas
emotion.desc: Sempre haverá gente disposta a agir apenas dentro de sua zona de conforto.
